content: each stitch around * 40 round 12 single_crochet x 5 inv decrease single_crochet x 11 inv decrease x 2 * 36 round 13 single_crochet in each stitch around * 36 round 14 inv decrease single_crochet x 4 x 6 * 30 round 15 single_crochet x 3 inv decrease x 6 * 24 slip_stitch into the next stitch tie off leaving a 8 in tail place eyes in round 10 4 stitches apart in lieu of safety eyes you can embroider them on or make them and sew them on alt eye pattern using 4 0 mm hook and black yarn mc chain 1 does not count 6 single_crochet in mc slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet tie off leaving a tail to sew on stuff head with polyfill with yarn needle feed tail of yarn in and out of the 24 last stitches of last row like a drawstring and slightly cinch the hole not closed leave open a little tie off and stuff excess into head place to the side ears using 4 0 mm hook and frosted green yarn round 1 mc chain 1 does not count 6 single_crochet in mc slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join 6 round 2 3 4 chain 1 does not count single_crochet in every stitch around 6 *stuff tail into pocket you just made round 5 chain 1 does not count increase single_crochet x 4 increase slip_stitch to join 8 round 6 7 chain 1 does not count single_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to join 8 round 8 chain 1 does not count increase single_crochet x 6 increase slip_stitch to join 10 round 9 chain 1 does not count increase single_crochet x 8 increase slip_stitch to join 12 round 10 chain 1 does not count increase single_crochet x 10 increase slip_stitch to join 14 round 11 12 chain 1 does not count single_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to join 14 *round 13 left ear chain 1 does not count inv decrease x 4 single_crochet x 4 inv decrease slip_stitch to join 11 *round 13 right ear chain 1 does not count inv decrease single_crochet x 4 inv decrease x 4 slip_stitch to join 11 tie off leaving 12 in tail for sewing ears will naturally cup in opposite directions hands make 2 using 4 0 mm hook and frosted green yarn round 1 mc chain 2 does not count 12 double_crochet in mc slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join 12 round 2 chain 2 does not count increase in each stitch around slip_stitch to join 24 finish off leaving 8 in tail for sewing *fold circle in half and using tail sew closed into half circle finish off sleeve make 2 using 5 5 mm hook and tan yarn round 1 leaving 12 in tail chain 10 slip_stitch to join to 1st chain be sure your chain is not twisted 10 round 2 chain 2 does not count 1 double_crochet in each stitch slip_stitch to join to 1st double_crochet 10 round 3
